name: import
title: Pathling Import Operation
description: This operation allows bulk data to be imported into the server from NDJSON, Parquet, or Delta format files, making the data available for query. Supports both FHIR Parameters and JSON request formats aligned with the SMART Bulk Data Import specification.

parameter.name: inputSource
parameter.documentation: URI for tracking the imported data throughout its lifecycle. Required by SMART Bulk Data Import specification.

parameter.name: input
parameter.documentation: An array of input files to import. Each input specifies a resource type and the location of a file containing resources of that type.

part.name: type
part.documentation: The FHIR resource type contained within this input file.

part.name: url
part.documentation: The URL of the input file containing resources of the specified type.

parameter.name: inputFormat
parameter.documentation: The MIME type of the input files as specified by the SMART Bulk Data Import specification. Supported values are 'application/fhir+ndjson' (default), 'application/parquet', and 'application/delta'.

parameter.name: mode
parameter.documentation: Controls how data is merged with existing resources (Pathling extension to SMART specification). Possible values are 'error' (fail if resources exist), 'overwrite' (delete and replace all existing resources; default), 'append' (add new resources without modifying existing), 'ignore' (skip if resources exist), and 'merge' (match by ID and update or add as appropriate).
